sqlMap.update: update comm_posts set post_deleted = 'Y', post_deleted_date = sysdate where post_no = #value#
update comm_post_comments set comment_deleted = 'Y', comment_deleted_date = sysdate where comment_no = #value#
sqlMap.select:
select * from (select row_number() over (order by p.post_created_date asc) row_numbers, p.post_no as no, p.post_board_no as boardNo, b.board_name as boardName, p.post_title as title, p.post_writer_no as writerNo, p.post_created_date as createdDate, p.post_read_count as readCount, p.post_suggestion_count as suggestionCount, p.post_content as content, e.emp_name as writerName from comm_posts p, comm_employees e, comm_boards b where post_writer_no = #empNo# and p.post_writer_no = e.emp_no and b.board_no = p.post_board_no and p.post_deleted = 'N'
and p.post_title like '%' || #keyword# || '%'
and p.post_content like '%' || #keyword# || '%'
) where row_numbers between #begin# and #end#

select * from (select row_number() over (order by c.comment_created_date asc) row_numbers, c.comment_no as no, c.comment_emp_no as empNo, c.comment_content as content, c.comment_deleted as deleted, c.comment_created_date as createdDate, c.comment_updated_date as updatedDate, c.comment_deleted_date as deletedDate, c.comment_post_no as postNo, p.post_board_no as boardNo, b.board_name as boardName from comm_post_comments c, comm_posts p, comm_boards b where c.comment_emp_no = #empNo# and c.comment_post_no = p.post_no and p.post_board_no = b.board_no and c.comment_deleted = 'N') where row_numbers between #begin# and #end#

select * from (select row_number() over (order by n.notice_created_date asc) row_numbers, n.notice_no as no, n.notice_post_no as postNo, n.notice_send_emp_no as sendEmpNo, e.emp_name as sendEmpName, n.notice_receive_emp_no as receiveEmpNo, n.notice_content as content, n.notice_reading_status as readingStatus, n.notice_deleted as deleted, n.notice_created_date as createdDate, n.notice_updated_date as updatedDate, n.notice_deleted_date as deletedDate, p.post_board_no as boardNo, b.board_name as boardName from comm_post_notices n, comm_employees e, comm_posts p, comm_boards b where n.notice_send_emp_no = e.emp_no and p.post_no = n.notice_post_no and p.post_board_no = b.board_no and n.notice_receive_emp_no = #empNo# and n.notice_deleted = 'N') where row_numbers between #begin# and #end#

select count(*) from comm_posts where post_writer_no = #empNo# and post_deleted = 'N'
and post_title like '%' || #keyword# || '%'
and post_content like '%' || #keyword# || '%'
select count(*) from comm_posts where post_writer_no = #value# and post_deleted = 'N'
select count(*) from comm_post_comments where comment_emp_no = #value# and comment_deleted = 'N'
select count(*) from comm_post_notices where notice_receive_emp_no = #value# and notice_reading_status = 'N' and notice_deleted = 'N'

select e.emp_no as empNo, e.emp_created_date as createdDate, d.department_name as deptName, p.position_name as positionName, e.emp_name as name, e.emp_phone as phone, e.emp_email as email from comm_employees e, comm_departments d, comm_positions p where e.emp_dept_no = d.department_no and e.emp_position_no = p.position_no and emp_no = #value#
